website_summaries.verdict: A good budget high altitude resistance mask that makes it easy to get a good workout.
pros: The mask is extremely easy to set up and use
Adjustable straps are compatible with a variety of facial shapes and sizes
Controls for the multiple resistance levels are within convenient reach
cons: The head strap is difficult to remove from the mask itself when it comes time to wash the strap

customer_reviews.title: So far the best thing I've bought on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Ok my glasses are crooked because I fell, but I want to show how well this fits. If it didn't fit perfectly my glasses would have been all fogged up. This is the first product I've ever worn of my face that didn't fog up my glasses. I've been wearing this while I ride my bike to and from work. It stays in place and does it's job. It's super easy to use, and actually very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: larry

customer_reviews.title: Don't 2nd guess it.
customer_reviews.text: The mask is great fits perfectly, lightweight, easy to clean, doesn't bounce nor slide around. I've ran 3.5 miles minimum up to 6 miles max without removing the mask. I was diagnosed with asthma as a youth. Something mentally clicks in my brain that forces me to control my breathing somehow that provides me with more energy. Great Product!! Shipped Quickly!! Well worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Oneal

customer_reviews.title: Wife thinks it stupid but then liked it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome I’m learning to breath finally. Ran up and down some big hills first day and took in deep breaths instead of my normal quick in and outs. My wife who laughed at the ridiculousness of me buying this tried it and liked how she felt breathing also. Although she has yet to run with it “or without one for that matter” the fact she liked it should tell you something. The look is pretty cool I’ve seen others that look like painters mask. At this point I don’t really care what anyone thinks I want to push myself hard as possible and this is another tool for that.
customer_reviews.author: BuyerUSA1

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality... very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this purchase... the product is poorly made with poor quality... I’m returning ASAP
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: Best Elevation Training Mask I've Tried!
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple training masks from other companies and honestly this is by far the best mask I've tried so far! Very comfortable to wear didn't slip or move around when I was doing HIIT training. There are two switches on the front of the mask that adjust the different levels. For me this was a game changer because I could adjust mid workout without having to take the mask off and insert or take out the valves. Mask is very lightweight compared to my other two masks whichmade it more comfortable working out. Highly recommend this mask! And the price is so worth it!
customer_reviews.author: R. Stoner

customer_reviews.title: Great Altitude Acclimatizing Tool
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this as part of my conditioning routine to acclimate for a trip to Mt. Everest. It's easy to use and I have found it effective at reducing my oxygen saturation during my anaerobic workouts. I use a pulse oximeter to measure/verify my conditioning progress with the mask. Its 8 levels of restriction increases allow for a planned routine of conditioning to meet my training goal. Customer service is excellent. My questions were answered very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Shrug

customer_reviews.title: Build up your resistance and tolerance with the valves before you go hardcore.
customer_reviews.text: Received the mask within a day. I got the ACU Digital camo color. Very lightweight mask unlike others. I was able go propel my training to the next level with this elivation mask. I do alot of 12k rtucking and sand bag TRAINING for Law Enforcement. The mask allwed me to have better lung endurance. Looks bad ass in the camo and it does the job. It's all that you need and all that you don't.
customer_reviews.author: Jessenia M Leader

customer_reviews.title: Long distance runner
customer_reviews.text: If you’re an long distance runner, This mask will give you challenge honestly really helps you Control your breathing . I love this mask . I put on every time when I go jogging around block , park and beach
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: This product has made a big difference in my training regiment. My endurance has increased tremendously since I began utilizing this item. Only word of advice I have is to make sure to flip-flop the resistance washers so that one faces a different direction than the other in their housing. Otherwise you effectively block either you inhalation or exhalation.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, One Issue
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for the money. It is cheaper and does the same job as other masks. It feels well made and feels good on the skin. One thing that I did not like about this product (Even though it specifies in the description that one size fits most) the band that goes under my ear is loose and doesn't have a tight fit at the bottom of your mouth. I did not want to disregard a star because that, but beware of that, might not have the perfect fit for certain people!
customer_reviews.author: Dane W.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I tried their old mask and it was great! Then I saw their new design and fell in love with it as all other mask are the same just under different brands. The mask has multiple resistance levels and very lightweight! I don’t know why, but this mask just feels better (maybe because the little air you get flows better). I highly recommend this mask for anyone trying to enhance their workouts! You can’t go wrong with Vikingstrength!
customer_reviews.author: OleBondevik

customer_reviews.title: Great for active activities
customer_reviews.text: This mask is very easy to use and extremely comfortable as adjustable straps are built in making sure it will be a perfect size on you no matter the size of your head. With indoor gyms now open, this mask works 1000X better then the disposal masks as this mask is more breathable and easier to work out with. This is a real professional mask and it looks great. It comes with a nice convenient bag to keep it staying clean.
customer_reviews.author: Matt E

customer_reviews.title: Improves your lung strength
customer_reviews.text: This is the first product I tried for any training mask ever. Using it reminded me of the mental challenges and endurance back in the fire dept. I used it with my strength training that involved a quick cardio warm up and deadlifts. After 2 hours of training, I felt like it was easier to breathe and catch my breath afterwards. Of course there's controversy on the benefits but I just love the challenge of almost passing out. If you're into that stuff. It also looks pretty badass. Like a ninja.
customer_reviews.author: kukunaokala begay

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this item accoridng to the mentioned sizing and it does not fit not because the size is small but the suction cup design to jold your jaw is not made from good material and it doesn't stick. Not recommending this to anyone. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Shamsher

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, awesome for cardio improvement!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! My husband has been wearing it everyday for training and his cardio has been much better since. He’s an athlete and cardio is super important for competitions, he is excited for his next competition to see how much his cardio has improved. Great product, arrived on time, well made and even comes with a nice little bag to carry the mask around.
customer_reviews.author: bjord9

customer_reviews.text: I bought this. But don’t think I’ll use it. I feel like Hannibal Lector. When I wear it. There’s a lot more restriction of breathing than I expected. Think I’ll have the kids use it for a Halloween costume.
customer_reviews.author: Robby Morgan

customer_reviews.title: *Update* My package was opened prior to receiving it
customer_reviews.text: The package appeared to be cut with a sharp object at the bottom. I'm not sure if I received everything that comes with the mask. They made it right and sent me another mask right away. I used it this week, it definitely makes you feel as if you are in a high altitude environment. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I gave this item 4 stars instead of five because of Some trouble I had getting a product it was not damaged but the co owner of the company emailed me personally and he spent hours and days working on getting me a product that was not damaged and replaced them with that questions without ask he replace them that kind of service I will come back at four every time this company is willing to make relationships with their customers work I will always go back to Viking strength for more products Excellent company excellent people
customer_reviews.author: Joe DeLong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cardio!! Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this mask to use when I ride bike to up the intensity a bit and definitely helps out alot! Great quality and a great price! Shipped fast and easy to use! Fits well on my face and looks mean! I give it a 10/10 due to its quality and pricing! MUST HAVE FOR CARDIO!
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok, my problem is that when I started training with this type of masks I began with the original full face mask and that one has a killer seal, this is the problem with the newer models, the seal sucks (or actually doesn’t “suck”) so I feel fresh air coming in through the sides after I exhale, so my workouts are not as miserable as I’d like them to be... I also don’t feel any difference in pressure if I movevthe dials up or down.
customer_reviews.author: JAmaro

customer_reviews.title: Not what I had hoped for
customer_reviews.text: I really don’t like the way this looks or fits. The cutouts on the cheeks squeeze the face in an awkward way and cause them to puff out. The 24-way adjustability is nice in theory but it requires too much fiddling and you have to manually install the second valve if you want the full 24 settings. It’s small and if you don’t install it immediately it’s more likely to get lost than ever used. It is very quiet during breathing but that’s about the only thing I liked about it. I ended up order the EVA that’s a little bit more and I recommend that one over this one.
customer_reviews.author: BN

customer_reviews.title: Great for steady state cardio
customer_reviews.text: Great product overall as it it’s easy to use, easy to clean and works well throughout various levels of resistance setting. However after a certain level of intensity, relative to the individual, the straps begin to stretch considerably when soaked in sweat, reducing face-mask seal. If you’re doing steady state cardio (run, bike, row, elliptical,etc) it will probably maintain a good seal. If you’re doing HIIT or CrossFit style workouts you may become frustrated with how often you are readjusting the face piece or strap tension. Again great product-up to a point, with room for improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Patton

customer_reviews.title: A Whole new level of fitness
customer_reviews.text: Avid runner and first time fitness mask user. I was always intrigued and interested in using one to see what the hype or the big deal was...Ohhhhhhh, I learned quickly and very well just the other day. This masked challenged me and I loved it. Easy to use, lightweight and comfortable, if your looking to elevate your training, this is a great way to challenge yourself and to push yourself to a whole new level.
customer_reviews.author: cassandra reese

customer_reviews.title: Marathon prep / pandemic protection
customer_reviews.text: Truly enjoy using this mask for workouts, runs around the city, and general protection (using n95 inserts/cutouts sold separately when not running). Extremely fashionable, sturdy, and the travel bag and extras that come with are a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: JQ

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable, but strongest mask.
customer_reviews.text: The mask is great for any type of workout because you can feel the mask making it harder to breath creating a better workout. It’s comfortable and stays on well and is very easy to clean. Highly recommend if your looking for something to make your workouts harder.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Quality mask from a trusted brand
customer_reviews.text: I have always wanted a training mask and I finally got Vikingstrength Fitness Mask VOL 2. I choose Vikingingstrength since they have been on the market for over two years and are one of the biggest providers of elevation masks. The mask is lightweight, fits perfectly and is beautifully designed. I was surprised by the high quality and sturdiness (This is one of the Cheapest masks on the market)! I can already tell my respirator system have improved and I can’t wait to see more results in the future! I highly recommend Vikingstrength Trainingmask
customer_reviews.author: Trym N

customer_reviews.title: Can’t breathe While working out even on the lowest setting
customer_reviews.text: UMMM YOU CANT BREATHE WITH THIS THING ON IN THE GYM. IF YOURE JUST SITTING AROUND THE HOUSE ITS OK I SUPPOSE, BUT DOING ANYTHING STRENUOUS IS NEARLY IMPOSSIBLE. I HAVE ANOTHER TRAINING MASK AND ON THE LOWEST SETTING I CAN BREATHE QUITE EASILY. BUT WITH THIS ONE ON THE LOWEST SETTING I CAN BARELY BREATHE.
customer_reviews.author: JASON SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: Good if you don’t care about quality or long term use
customer_reviews.text: Head strap is very thin, I don’t imagine it’ll hold up for more than a month or so. Best quality about the mask is the levers on the outside to adjust restriction without taking the mask off. But you still have to take off the mask to adjust the valves on the inside of the mask which negates the benefit of the levers on the outside in my opinion. Better off spending the extra cash and getting a name brand training mask Ike the 2.0 or 3.0. This mask isn’t built for intense hardcore training.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Dormil

customer_reviews.title: my fault, thought I was purchasing a n91 mask.
customer_reviews.text: admittedly I am not a sports enthusiasts , but , I cannot see how starving my lungs of oxygen during exercise would benefit me.I feel that the loss of air to the brain would kill much needed cells. Just a thought from a common sense perspective form a average person and not a fanatic.
customer_reviews.author: Clifford HILL

customer_reviews.title: Different mask, Amazing results!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a fitness enthusiast always in search for the best quality. I’m happy I went for this mask and not the same generic mask you see branded under 6 different sellers here on Amazon! This mask is high quality, lightweight and easy to use. I’m currently on level 2 but working my way up. I use this mask 3 times a week and have definitely gained more endurance. Can’t wait to see more results! Thanks Vikingstrength!
customer_reviews.author: Victor Fit

customer_reviews.title: Not for the faint of heart.
customer_reviews.text: Working out in is great, not to tight, gives you spare rubber valves that you can swap out a clean, simple instructions, change the lever to what most suits you. The problem i thought I would have is it getting too tight around my head with a cap on while i was running... no issues at all. Great product, you WILL feel the difference In your breathing but the difference is for the better. Usually, I do mile runs with long straights roads I sprint the streets. Have to say, with the mask restricting me I was forced to control my breathing and BY GOLLY does it work. Peace, love, and positivity.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel S.

customer_reviews.title: Will know how much endurance you really have!
customer_reviews.text: First time using it today. All I have to say is you workout is more intense and you will really know how much endurance you really have. Comfortable to use and most important is does not fall off. For cardio I do jump rope and boxing drills. You can tell the difference when u adjust the intensity. Most likely will use during my cardio especially boxing drills!
customer_reviews.author: joel m ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Take your cardio to the next level
customer_reviews.text: Very cool piece of workout gear! It is brutal and will definitely strengthen your lungs and cardio!
customer_reviews.author: M. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Best mask I have had
customer_reviews.text: This mask will put you to work and make you famous the same time. No one notice me till I put this on
customer_reviews.author: Denn

customer_reviews.title: For advanced athletes
customer_reviews.text: This mask definitely makes training tougher. Even in the lightest setting, there is labored breathing, but that’s what I bought this for! The mask is very easy to wear and fits comfortably. I recommend this product for anyone looking to add elevation training to their regimen.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Baker

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product to enhance workouts!
customer_reviews.text: This product has enhanced my endurance x10. Great addition for anyone that is looking to increase cardio or endurance during workouts. If worn during weight lifting this can help even those completely opposed to a formal cardio workout. I only gave the product four stars because of the support strap. When walking or perform static workouts the mask fits fine; however, during a serious workout or when I begin to sweat the mask starts to slide. The only improvement that I suggest is offering an adjustable support strap. Overall great product. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: In the end, the seller made it right.
customer_reviews.text: Product broke before I could even use it. That being said, the seller refunded me immediately. It could have been a lemon, but they have training masks on Amazon that have a lifetime warranty, I am just going to go with one of those.
customer_reviews.author: RyanandHeather

customer_reviews.title: Great for Athletes
customer_reviews.text: My wrestling son says he doesn’t feel too much difference until he turns the dial. What’s funny is when I bought it I never thought there’d be a pandemic months later so this is great for him of course with closed valves. How do we clean this?
customer_reviews.author: Verified Customer ”Harvesting Life’s Lessons”

customer_reviews.title: Great training between cross country & track season
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son uses this for running hills. It has helped him bridge the time between sports seasons, keeping him in shape. He says the mask is comfortable, but the back strap does slip at times. Overall he loves it and uses it on runs several times each week.
customer_reviews.author: Living_Lime_Green

customer_reviews.title: Size small only
customer_reviews.text: I had hoped that since the mask was aimed at men that this would fit me (especially since it's all made in China anyway).... it's not... if you have ever wore a military mask or a 3m mask, this came in a size small
customer_reviews.author: Vlerden

customer_reviews.title: Great Product and Customer Service.
customer_reviews.text: This product is no joke. Used it and it does what it suppose to do. Not only that customer service is A+. I highly recommend this vendor and product. They stand behind their product.
customer_reviews.author: ChevyBlackout

customer_reviews.title: Decent mask for the money
customer_reviews.text: The mask fits well and adjusts easily. The instructions are minimal and it takes some experimenting to get the mask to give the proper resistance. I am still working on that but it works pretty well so far.
customer_reviews.author: JR's thoughts

customer_reviews.title: The bag is also nice
customer_reviews.text: I must say this mask is by far one of the best out there. Fits snug against my face and does feel like its cutting across my nose when i work out. I recommend this product and for the right price this is a must have product.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin H.

customer_reviews.title: Better then expected
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 16 year old and he did not think our was going to be as good as one he saw at the sporting goods store. He just does not like how the strap has to go on his head. But he does like how it works.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Best Mask on the market !
customer_reviews.text: Literary the best mask for me personal. I would say that I could imagine anyone with a lot of chin hair could have a problem with the mask because the valves are on the bottom part of the mask. Other than that, no sweat gets inside, easy straps to be secure throughout any work. 5 out of 5
customer_reviews.author: Alexis Renee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit right; it slips off .
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t fit right to the contour of the head It slips off . A little pricey Delivery takes so long like more than a month maybe because of the pandemic and the protest
customer_reviews.author: Mel B.

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and good for training !
customer_reviews.text: This fancy training mask is awesome! I just finished my training with it, and oh man that is hard! It's levels are crazy, I got used to in the of my training and then I realized the big difference the mask was doing. I'm Viking lover and Bane fan as well, so what can I say...I loved it's design! Good quality for training, good looking and, it came really fast! 100% recommendable.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Roman Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The product came in a good speed with prime. First day back in the gym and was able to have it ready to go. Simple to use and was able to fit different sizes considering my girlfriend and I both got one. The adjustable air flow is a nice feature which allows for some room to adjust depending on what type of exercises you are doing. Overall very pleased with it. Was also simple to take a part and clean with no issues for the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Gallimore

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: For working out i run alot and I wanted more of a challenge and I must say I got the challenge I was looking for this mask is great its comfortable and fits perfectly and u can feel the difference in air flow with every move of the selector great product.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: High quality breathing mask
customer_reviews.text: Amazing mask!! Check my photoshoot using my mask from vikingstrength. Instagram: Elyt_fitness
customer_reviews.author: Hana

customer_reviews.title: Great product I recommend
customer_reviews.text: I use this training mask! for high intensity training, to better prepare me for wrestling. Works well... gets the job done and for the price this is a steal!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Good training tool
customer_reviews.text: If you are not residing at a high altitude location, this is the next best thing you can get to simulate training at high altitude.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: The mask is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a mask to take my fitness to the next level for my MMA career. Lets just say that I could instantly feel my chest expand while running and also tapping into that inner beast quicker when I lift. Definitely recommend this product, it is easy to fit on and I would say one size fits all.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle VanHeulen

customer_reviews.title: best mask i have tried so far.
customer_reviews.text: This mask is very comfortable to wear, and with the different levels of breathing it really helps build your lungs. I have tried different mask in the past and was very disappointed. I will be sticking with this company for sure. To top it off the mask is very stylish with a unique custom look.
customer_reviews.author: kevin wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff buy NOW
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived on time, Came in its own bag to keep in I loved it and once you try it on it makes you feel all pumped up I got straight to working out and I started sweating more than usual I feel like it will do it’s job and I will leave more reviews later on
customer_reviews.author: Alex montoya

customer_reviews.title: Good for breathing problems
customer_reviews.text: As a person who was born 24 weeks premature, I always had bad lung function. I was resigned to the facts my lungs would always be bad. Then I stumbled upon this one while working out one day and decided I dont care how hard it is I'm gonna force my lungs to improve. It was hard and sometimes painful but that thanks to this mask my lung capacity has almost doubled. You guys at Vikingstrength have improved my strength substantially
customer_reviews.author: thomas bishop

customer_reviews.title: Viking Strength workout mask a good investment.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product alot fits snug and secure works like it's suppose to. Comes with easy instructions light weight and easy to put on. Different levels makes it easier to breathe if your a rookie and harder once your a pro. Like the all black color and the velcro for strapping it on. With the whole covid going on it's a good investment worth the money and easy take where ever you go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Endurance and Stamina
customer_reviews.text: I am a long distance runner that was looking to train in higher elevations without traveling. The mask is perfect for just that. It gives you various settings to adjust the air intake that will be comfortable for you. Caution though, you must ease into it because it restricts your regular air intake when running. I definitely recommend this product for all runners to use during their training.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Mask BUT......
customer_reviews.text: Good mask but for me it does not have a tight seal when it goes on your face. You have to adjust when you're working out and it throws off your whole workout.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: results speak volume!
customer_reviews.text: I am on week 3 of working out with my new training mask. I currently am training for a fight and not much time to do extreme cardio so I adjusted my workouts to include the challenges this mask gives and BOOM! more lung capacity by the day baby! Definitely worth trying...
customer_reviews.author: Alonzo Farrer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I was quickly impressed with the quality, flexibility and ease of use. This is a perfect training item for a wide range of people as it is easily customizable to adjust how much oxygen you wish to regulate while training. The fit is natural, comfortable and easily customizable. Naturally you'll have trouble forming a proper seal with a beard but that is unavoidable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Koch

customer_reviews.title: Great lung training tool
customer_reviews.text: Easy out of the box use. Using it to build up lung strength during my workouts and runs. Great item and loving the results. Instantly challenged me and provided another level of difficulty for me.
customer_reviews.author: Richard C

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Protection
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding added N95 filter purchased separately and I am completely protected❗️Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: goodfriendstg

customer_reviews.title: 🤙🏾
customer_reviews.text: Good product I almost die jogging, I’m pretty athletic and this will even increase my stamina
customer_reviews.author: Darius

customer_reviews.title: Mask already helping
customer_reviews.text: just got the mask, simple instructions on how to properly use it and take care of it. Hoping it helps with my endurance and getting my breathing better under control when exercising. Tried it out while playing with the pup and besides him being slightly scared lol it worked.
customer_reviews.author: ALesha Petrunak

customer_reviews.title: This will kick your butt!
customer_reviews.text: I've been training with mine for three weeks now and only on level two. This thing will kick your butt while working out. I feel like I can breathe better during the day after wearing it for my morning workouts! Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Quality with a fair price
customer_reviews.text: I already own that other brand, but my son ( college lacrosse) is always taking it. So I saw VikingStrength now has the mask, now he’s trying to swipe my VikingStrength Training Mask.
customer_reviews.author: DD

customer_reviews.title: suprisingly effective
customer_reviews.text: i honestly dont know if its mental or not but after training with the mask ive ran faster and repped more weight without it. i like adding this to my workouts
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I find this product extremely useful in helping me enhance my workout experience! I can feel my lungs working harder for air which is a great feeling. The only issue I have has to do with the levels of difficulty, specifically going from one rubber stopper to two rubber stoppers. I feel like it going from mild to extreme pretty quickly. There should be a level in between.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping and really intensifies every workout! Definitely recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Start off slow if you have never trained in high altitude or used a restriction mask. Its a marathon
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Value. 2 weeks w/ 2-a-day cardio & strength training. Use w/ my 40lb rack pack and after a week I noticed cardio response recovery time is incredible. Trained in denver, Co and this is the closet to HAT(High Altitude Training) you can get!
customer_reviews.author: Augustine  Emeagwai

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Use it to do HIIT and have really improved my cardio.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Castro

customer_reviews.title: Cheap design, extremely overpriced
customer_reviews.text: The cover for the mask is a press on component made with cheap plastic prongs. Second time using the mask the cover fell off, prongs broke while trying to place it back on. I can’t imagine this product costs more than $15 to manufacture. Made with cheap materials and poorly thought through design. Better off spending elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy lightweight product that performs great at a better cost then most
customer_reviews.text: I like the feel a lot as well as how easy it is to change the settings, as well as how I can change weather the restriction is on my inhale, exhale, or both. The mask is lightweight as well, making it something I can keep on my face for a while without slipping or irritation. Overall this is a sturdy, nice product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mask for upping your cardio demand
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a training mask that worked and would not break the bank. Viking mask fit the bill. Light easy to use and effective. Has really helped up my plataued cardio workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M.

customer_reviews.title: Skeptical at first but it was worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my younger brother who is an avid athlete. I was skeptical buying one of these at first because of my very limited knowledge on buying one of these.... but definitely worth it. It came fast and the the mini bag it comes with is a plus. The fact that it’s easy to put together and also how well it’s manufactured is great. It’s not cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Ok for running, not much else
customer_reviews.text: Works great! For about the first 30 seconds. After which it slides off your face, allowing air to enter. Should be ok for running, but not much else. Tried using mine for jiu jitsu drills on a dummy, but the mask isn’t sealed at all, and can’t be tightened more to prevent air leaking in. Slid right off my face.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson

customer_reviews.title: Great mask, totally recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have fallen in love with this mask. This aggressive design, great quality, and perfect fit has made me totally satisfied. I definitely recommend this product to anyone who wants to bring own workout routine to a new level.
customer_reviews.author: D Safonkina

customer_reviews.title: Okay mask
customer_reviews.text: Have a air leak at the top idk if it might be to big but not a proper seal at the top over all good mask for the gym.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the mask for a month now and i'm happy with the product. It also helps you to control your breathing and not feeling exhausted after working out, really happy with it 💪💪💪
customer_reviews.author: Juan Saldarriaga

customer_reviews.title: Half decent product, could be better
customer_reviews.text: Half decent product but needs improvement. Item does not fill all sizes and is not always sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: A little difficult at first to remove the front piece. Still unable to correctly install the provided valves, other than that, a solid product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good job
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used it several times and the product does what it says it will do. It’s adjustable and fits comfortably on my head and face. I tend to walk with it so that I can take my workout up a notch without pounding my joints.
customer_reviews.author: Cantor R. Eichaker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Have to get use to wearing it only used it once so far
customer_reviews.author: felix wooden

customer_reviews.title: Could find something better
customer_reviews.text: Honestly wasn’t all that thrilled. Got this for my boyfriend, and a piece broke off before he got even used it. It’s currently collecting dust
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Love to bexable to breath agian
customer_reviews.text: Great little mask helps me a increasing my lung capacity and breathing.
customer_reviews.author: ALBERTO B.

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Product was not sturdy would pop off while working out
customer_reviews.author: samantha Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Works well but quality lacks
customer_reviews.text: It was good for a couple months then began coming apart at the seams.
customer_reviews.author: William Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Masked man
customer_reviews.text: Great value product for work outs. Does what it claims to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this mask to anyone!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am an ultrarunner, I bought this mask to take my trainings to the next level. The mask is very well put together. I've been using it for 3 days now and love the fit. I can tell my results in training are going to get better. I give it a 10/10.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel G.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this for my son and he was disappointed with the quality and the function I am highly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Humberto

customer_reviews.title: Great mask for training
customer_reviews.text: Mask is great . Only downfall is the Velcro strap . Would be better if it was a clip with adjustable straps
customer_reviews.author: darren goldberg

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful and useful
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that the item was easy to use and could help me out
customer_reviews.author: King_saulsby

customer_reviews.title: Viking Strength is Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This High altitude Elevation workout mask came highly recommended, and has yet to disappoint. Lightweight, non-slip, comfortable. I appreciate the space allowed for you ears. I didnt understand about what it had to offer about mental toughness. After a couple of uses, I have come to respect this piece of equipment!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Paola

customer_reviews.title: 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.text: Excellent improvements and definitely like the new look! Great job guys @vikingstrength.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Viking Stength
customer_reviews.text: I was underwhelmed at the first touch of this product. But looks can be deceiving. Through further inspection and trial, this product took me by surprise. I went for a trial run (1.5 run) and was completely blown away. This product lives to the name "Viking Strength" do not be fooled by the touch of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Boyadjian

customer_reviews.title: Read the directions.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. It does the job I need it to do. I shared your products image on my Instagram story as well. If I do that, that's about the best review I can give.
customer_reviews.author: adam

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Comfortable on your face.
customer_reviews.text: I like how stylish it is and its so easy to use and its really great product. Actually works. Doesnt feel cheap at all.Its light and stable. Not like other ones where it keeps on moving while youre running its very comfortable doesnt hurt my face. Such a great product totally getting another for my brother.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I started using the product for my Exercise routine. As required by the gym for COVID-19. In the past, I knew of some athletes using this type mask to increase performance. Therefore, I figured I would give it a try. Works great so far, sturdy, easy to clean and fits great. .
customer_reviews.author: Gary S. Dias

customer_reviews.title: Helps immensely with Endurance
customer_reviews.text: This product has been great. Sturdy! Easy to use! And most importantly it’s really helping with my endurance when running and helping me to learn how to control my breathing. Love this product and highly recommend it to whoever is trying to really push themselves when working out.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Geldziler

product_meta.title: Vikingstrength New 24 Levels Training Workout Mask for Running Biking MMA Endurance with Adjustable Resistance, High Altitude Elevation Mask for Air Resistance Training
feature_bullets: ✅ AWAKE YOUR VIKING AND CONQUER YOUR WAY TO VICTORY: Scandinavians are known for high physical stamina and endurance due to the high mountain environment. Vikingstrength are now bringing these mountains to you! Experience high altitude training and the extreme results it brings with it anywhere! Awake your viking and discover your champion!
✅ DECREASE YOUR WORKOUT TIME DRAMATICALLY: Less oxygen, harder working muscles, faster fatigue, faster results! Used to improve athletes in all sports!

✅ CHALLENGE YOURSELF: Elevate your workouts and burn more calories. Vikingstrength fitness mask works by Creating Pulmonary Resistance allowing your lungs to increase inhaling capacity and deliver more oxygen giving you the ultimate high intensity workout. studies show you'll boost your stamina and experience less fatigue. One size fits most between 120-230 lbs!

✅ WHY CHOOSE 4 WHEN YOU CAN HAVE 24 RESISTANCE LEVELS?: Vikingstrength smart design offer 24 resistance levels, ranging from 2000-18 000 FT. From beginner to top athlete. Change resistance with mask on!

✅ INCLUDES FREE STORAGE BAG AND COVERED BY VIKINGSTRENGTH GUARANTEE: Take the next step now, click “Add to cart”, and discover your physical limits only to destroy them! Awake your Viking now! You have nothing to risk with our 100% satisfaction guarantee.
